author: samlafer
content:
Hello. Wondering if anyone here knows why EIP197 (bn254 pairing precompiled contract: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-197.md#encoding) encoded the imaginary part first (asking because I had bugs in my code because of it):
`Elements a * i + b of F_p^2 are encoded as two elements of F_p, (a, b)`
